original_text: So Solomon made all the vessels that were in the house of the Lord: the golden altar, the golden table for the bread of the Presence,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 또 여호와의 성전의 모든 기구를 만들었으니 곧 금 단과 진설병의 금 상과

sentences.original_text: So Solomon made all the vessels
that were in the house of the Lord:
the golden table for the bread of the Presence,
